name: Kneeler Boot - Compound Bonded
description: A two-piece boot system with a rigid PLA upper shell for stability and a soft TPU floor pad for grip. Parts are bonded together with adhesive.

printSettings.upperBoot: Polymaker PLA Pro (Black) | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill
printSettings.floorPad: TPU 90A | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill | Print Speed < 40mm/s

assemblyGuide: Clean surfaces: remove any stringing from the internal wedge cavity.
Apply Glue: place 2-3 drops of Loctite 406 inside the PLA upper boot cavity.
Press-Fit: press the TPU floor pad wedge into the PLA cavity until flush.
Cure: let sit for 60 seconds before installing on the pew.
